headline: Halliburton to Provide Well Stimulation Services for ConocoPhillips
summary: The contract spans five years and includes three optional extension periods.

content.title: Halliburton to Provide Well Stimulation Services for ConocoPhillips
content.summary: The contract spans five years and includes three optional extension periods.

headline: Gold Reserve Provides Update on Briefing Regarding Adjournment of Sale Hearing
summary: PEMBROKE, Bermuda, August 18, 2025--Gold Reserve Ltd. (TSX.V: GRZ) (BSX: GRZ.BH) (OTCQX: GDRZF) ("Gold Reserve" or the "Company") announces that pursuant to the schedule set by the U.S. District Court for the District of Delaware (the "Court"), the Company and various parties submitted opening and response briefs on August 16 and August 17, 2025, respectively, in relation to the inclinations stated by the Court in its August 14, 2025 Order adjourning the Sale Hearing.

content.title: Gold Reserve Provides Update on Briefing Regarding Adjournment of Sale Hearing
content.summary: PEMBROKE, Bermuda, August 18, 2025--Gold Reserve Ltd. (TSX.V: GRZ) (BSX: GRZ.BH) (OTCQX: GDRZF) ("Gold Reserve" or the "Company") announces that pursuant to the schedule set by the U.S. District Court for the District of Delaware (the "Court"), the Company and various parties submitted opening and response briefs on August 16 and August 17, 2025, respectively, in relation to the inclinations stated by the Court in its August 14, 2025 Order adjourning the Sale Hearing.
